Author: SpheneDev
Name: Sphene
Description: Through the power of Living Memory, this plugin harmonizes your Penumbra modifications and Glamourer configurations across all connected souls, ensuring endless synchronization in your shared digital realm.
Punchline: Become Endless. Return to Living Memory.
TestingChangelog:
Testing Version
** Added **
* Automatic or manual texture conversion mode.
* In automatic mode, textures are automatically reduced in size in the background.
* A spinning indicator is displayed in the control panel during automatic conversion.

** Settings **
* New Textures tab added with new settings.
* Experimental tab added with experimental settings.

** Changed and Improved **
* The backup system has been massively improved.
* Backups are now sensibly assigned to mods to correctly back up duplicate textures.
* Backup files can now automatically save up to 85% storage space in a zip archive.
* The Texture Conversion window has been tidied up a bit and expanded with the Texture Settings.
* The Sphene Icon can now be locked via right click context menu

** Experimental **
* Upload Conversion Gate.
* Active: Uploads wait for ongoing conversions (may cause delays).
* Deactivated: Uploads continue immediately (no waiting).
